recipe.title: Lemon-Garlic Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1 to 2 garlic cloves, smashed and peeled
1/2 cup canola oil or other neutral salad oil, such as walnut
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
instructions: Using a mortar and pestle, grind or crush garlic, lemon zest, and salt into a fine paste. Combine lemon juice, vinegar, water and sugar. Add to the garlic paste and then whisk in oil slowly; adjust seasoning to taste.
